effect: Increases the power of biting moves (e.g., Crunch, Ice Fang) by 50%.
synergies: Moves: Crunch, Ice Fang, Fire Fang, Thunder Fang, Poison Fang, Psychic Fangs
Items: Choice Band, Life Orb for further damage boosts
notes: Exclusive to certain Pokémon like Tyrantrum and Drednaw. Does not affect non-biting moves like Hyper Beam or Earthquake.
